effect.x_y: Inflicts regular damage. Hits 2–5 times in one turn. Has a 3/8 chance each to hit 2 or 3 times, and a 1/8 chance each to hit 4 or 5 times. Averages to 3 hits per use.
effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Inflicts regular damage. Hits 2–5 times in one turn. Has a 3/8 chance each to hit 2 or 3 times, and a 1/8 chance each to hit 4 or 5 times. Averages to 3 hits per use.

flavor_text.x_y: The user attacks by striking the target with its hard tail. It hits the target two to five times in a row.
flavor_text.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: The user attacks by striking the target with its hard tail. It hits the target two to five times in a row.
